holidays.title: National Clean Your Desk Day
holidays.description: Here are facts, tips, and motivation to help you organize and declutter today.

holidays.title: National Law Enforcement Appreciation Day
holidays.description: The perfect time to show officers we understand how difficult their job is.

holidays.title: Balloon Ascension Day
holidays.description: Hydrogen-powered hot air balloons are an adventurous, graceful gift of the French people to the world.

holidays.title: Coming of Age Day
holidays.description: Coming of Age Day is a Japanese tradition with many interesting elements and much glamour.

holidays.title: Golden Globe Awards
holidays.description: Our suggestions will have you glittering and celebrating just like the stars.

holidays.title: International Choreographers Day
holidays.description: A 5, 6, a 5, 6, 7, and TURN — it’s International Choreographers Day!

holidays.title: National Apricot Day
holidays.description: Romans call apricots precocious, but honestly, we think they are straight-up precious and delicious.

holidays.title: National Austin Day
holidays.description: Austin isn’t just a city in Texas; it’s the name of a cool guy or girl.

holidays.title: National Carter Day
holidays.description: Celebrate those who share their name with one of the most common last names in America.

holidays.title: National Cassoulet Day
holidays.description: Join foodies across the country as they lick their chops in delight on National Cassoulet Day!

holidays.title: National Faith Day
holidays.description: Cherish the ones in your life who are named Faith and express your love for them.

holidays.title: National Fourth Graders Day
holidays.description: Let's celebrate the magic of being 9 or 10 and show what fourth graders can do!

holidays.title: National Static Electricity Day
holidays.description: Let’s ignite a spark as we celebrate National Static Electricity Day together.

holidays.title: National WONK Day
holidays.description: Join us as we celebrate Washington D.C.s busy bodies this National WONK Day!

holidays.title: National Word Nerd Day
holidays.description: Learn some new words, use some old ones, and maybe even borrow them from someone else!

holidays.title: No Pants Subway Ride Day
holidays.description: Keep your pants on (for now) and learn more about this quirky yet very real holiday!

holidays.title: Panama's Martyrs' Day
holidays.description: Mount the Panamanian flag and let’s learn more about Martyrs’ Day in Panama!

holidays.title: Play God Day
holidays.description: God is good, and Play God Day is a day for us to be the same!

holidays.title: Plough Monday
holidays.description: We have all the details you need to know about this unique farmworkers festival.

holidays.title: Brent Rivera’s Birthday
holidays.description: Rivera has been entertaining us for most of his life, and isn’t slowing down yet!

holidays.title: Dave Matthews’s Birthday
holidays.description: Prepare to honor Dave Mattews, an incredible artist, philanthropist, activist, and family man.

holidays.title: Eret’s Birthday
holidays.description: This streamer has struck gold playing the popular online sandbox game, “Minecraft.”

holidays.title: Flo Milli’s Birthday
holidays.description: This fresh new face on the rap scene has plenty to offer fans and critics.

holidays.title: Nina Dobrev’s Birthday
holidays.description: It's difficult not to love the vampire girl, and there's more than one reason for that!

holidays.title: Quincy Boykins’s Birthday
holidays.description: We love to laugh with this talented young comedian and beloved online celebrity.

holidays.title: Richard Nixon’s Birthday
holidays.description: Nixon’s journey was from a California U.S. representative and senator to the U.S. president.

holidays.title: Sean Paul’s Birthday
holidays.description: Sean Paul is a powerhouse of talent and he deserves all the success he’s achieved.

holidays.title: Toosii’s Birthday
holidays.description: A millennial rapper that has gone from internet stardom to signing with well-known labels!

holidays.title: Wengie’s Birthday
holidays.description: This multi-talented YouTube star, actress, and singer is leaving a mark in the entertainment business.
